products.name: STA-56 Emulsion
products.description: Colorless liquid organic compound that is used in industry as a plasticizer in the manufacture of nail polish and other cosmetics.

products.name: AY 20 S
products.description: Esters of dicarboxylic acid are used in lubrication and plasticizers. With hexamethylenediamine, azelaic acid forms Nylon-6,9, which is a specialized plastic.

products.name: Antifoam AY-50
products.description: It is the most widely used general purpose plasticizer for the manufacture of flexible plastics, especially PVC

products.name: SAF
products.description: Cementing to Increase the Setting Time of the cement. They are specialty cementing slurry additive used to increase the thickening time for cement slurries to enable proper placement and is applicable for primary and secondary cementing jobs and is compatible with all API Oil well cements.

products.name: AY 20 S
products.description: Additives to reduce the setting time and increase the rate of Compressive strength, speeds up or shortens the normal rate of reaction time between cement and water which shortens the thickening time of the cement and increases the early strength of the cement required for the cement slurry to become hardened mass.

products.name: Disperse AY-45
products.description: Are additives that are pumped between the drilling fluid and the cement slurry to form a buffer and prevent the drilling fluid and the cement slurry from coming into contact.

products.name: AY 20 S
products.description: The chemical which is used for quickly moisten or watering the textile materials is called wetting agent.

products.name: Biocide AY 10
products.description: Dye fixing agent is nothing but a chemical that helps to fix up the dye particle into inner position of the fibre with the bondage.

products.name: STA-56 Emulsion
products.description: The chemical that will help to increase oxygen or electronegative part and release the hydrogen is known as oxidizing & reducing agent.
